frame.name: Exemplar
frame.definition: <def-root>This frame concerns a specific subset of <fen>Instance</fen>s of a <fen>Type</fen> which are evaluated in terms of their similarity to a conceptual prototype of the <fen>Type</fen>. The judgment of exemplariness may be made along a certain <fen>Domain</fen>. <ex>She is a <t>model</t> <fex name="Type">student</fex>.</ex> <ex>He's the <t>image</t> <fex name="Type">of a good father</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Instance
FE.definition: <def-root>A thing or episode that is considered exemplary of a certain <fen>Type</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Type
FE.definition: <def-root>The category of things or events from which an <fen>Instance</fen> is picked out.</def-root>

FE.name: Domain
FE.definition: <def-root>The comparative terms along which the <fen>Instance</fen> is deemed an exemplar of the <fen>Type</fen>.</def-root>
